Spira help

Node looks like this. Node has a name in the center and discoverd distance (N1.d) below.

When algorithm discoveres node it is red like this.

Nodes that are solved are green like this.

Edges look like this. Edge has its weight c(N1, N2) above.

Edges that are in queue are gray like this.

When algorithm scans new edge and discoveres new node they both turn red like this.
